a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Share of children in employment vs. GDP per capita, 2016
Colors represent world regions. Bubble sizes are proportional to the population of children aged 5-14 in each country.
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2022); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
